nodes.bodyText:
I wasn't aware of ThemeHelper.resolveResourceIdFromAttr (and it seems like the one who first put the button, and the reviewers too),
you should rebase, because it was changed two days ago, now both muted and unmuted use theme.
I haven't tested yet but the code seems ok
I tested and it worked as expected. Though for now do not test this PR as it is not ready ;-)
